response: Have you any further questions of this witness?
context/0: It is not incumbent on Mr. Mason to reveal how this trick was managed.
context/1: Overruled.
context/2: I demand to know how that trick was accomplished.
context/3: Counsel for defence is up to his usual grandstanding.
context/8: You'd have your powder burns, but you'd also have a hole in the fabric.
context/9: If I were to fire this blank into this fabric, what would happen?

context/0: Come on.
context/1: Now, you have to keep it quiet.
context/3: Petersen!
